definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

sentences.english: The ontological character of literary understanding signifies self-understanding of interpretive subject.
sentences.chinese: 理解的本體論性質意味着闡釋主體的自我理解。

sentences.english: This is the noumenon affirmation of the historical law.
sentences.chinese: 這是在本體論層面對歷史規律存在的肯定。

sentences.english: The first chapter is the literature ontology.
I have never seen anyone die for the ontologi-cal argument.
sentences.chinese: 我從來沒有見過有人爲本體論的爭辯而死。

sentences.english: Could you please explaining briefly on your thinking of the conflicts between ontology and constructionism?
sentences.chinese: 您是否可以對本體論和建構論之間的悖論稍作解釋？

sentences.english: Monk Zhao s theory of "Bu Zhen Kong Lun" is to deal with the problem concerning ontology.
sentences.chinese: 僧肇的《不真空論》論述的是“空”這一本體論問題。

sentences.english: The ontological methodology is fundamental for every theol…
sentences.chinese: 本體論方法對於每一種宗教哲學都是基本的。

sentences.english: Fan Ben body-theology that is absolutely anti-utopia.
sentences.chinese: 反本體論神學即反絕對烏托邦。

sentences.english: I only tell about 25% of my customers I am building ontologies.
sentences.chinese: 大約只有25%的客戶我會告訴他們我在構建本體論。

sentences.english: This article analyses Ji Kang's ontology on musical aesthetics thought.
sentences.chinese: 文章分析了嵇康音樂美學的本體論思想。

sentences.english: Do not confuse roles with objects within the ontology
sentences.chinese: 不要將角色和本體論中的對象混淆在一起。

sentences.english: The first part is mainly about the origins of Caruthers's theory of mind.
sentences.chinese: 本文的研究重點是卡拉瑟斯的心靈本體論。

sentences.english: Later Wittgenstein's study of language is a kind of ontological reflection.
sentences.chinese: 後期維特根斯坦則是在一種本體論意義上研究語言。

sentences.english: Among them, thoughts of praxis-meta-ontology and epistemology are especially remarkable.
sentences.chinese: 其中實踐一元本體論思想和認識論思想顯得尤爲突出。

sentences.english: This text will utilize the idea of ontology to develop the technology of multi- agent.
sentences.chinese: 本文將利用本體論觀念，開發多代理人技術。

sentences.english: Built in taxonomy and an extensible ontology for semantic mediation.
sentences.chinese: 爲語義中介內置分類法和可擴展本體論。
